intro: Psychotria mombachensis, commonly known as the Mombachensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or greenish flowers. It produces small, dark blue berries that are typically consumed by various bird species. Psychotria mombachensis is often found in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical rainforests.
